Nam Gayun

Korean: 남가 윤

Country:

South Korea

Group (2019-present):
CoCo

Introduction

Nam Gayun (남가윤) is a South Korean singer. She was a member of Fancy Factory's kids girl group CoCo. She is the twin sister of Nam Dayun.

Fancy Factory:
